pages.text:
Support Local Artists
post-media
Not only do we want to support our local businesses located in and around Lafayette County Florida we would also like to support our local artists. These can include musicians, writers, painters, and handcraft artists as well. Most of these artisans will not have a shop where you can go and purchase their work. If you are a local artist living and/or working within the Lafayette County Florida area please use our
CONTACT US
form and let us know about you, your work, and where you sell your items.
Drawing/Painting Artists
William Alfonso, Artist and DJ
Lives and Works in and around Lafayette County Florida
Email:
big.w.art.entertainment@gmail.com
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/bigWArtEntertainment/
Big “W” Art & Entertainment LLC (his business) is a full-service mobile DJ with Awesome sound and lights for all occasions, art design specializing in tattoo design, portraits, murals, window painting, and much more.
Juleah Austyne Art
Sells her work at the Fridays Lafayette County Farmers Market
Visit and Message her through her Facebook Pages
https://www.facebook.com/JuleahAustyneArt/
Handcraft Artists
Mary Anne and Keith McCray
ReVision
389 NE Blackberry Ln
Mayo, Florida 32066
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ReVisionMayo/
Only wishes to be contacted through her Facebook page
Almost all of our items are handmade and are made from 95% recycled materials. We reclaim lumber from barns and old houses and recycle it into new creations. The lumber from these barns and houses are from Florida’s early lumber heydays, so most of it is over 100 years old. Primarily we make birdhouses and potting benches, but we have made gardening totes and pallet signs. Each item is unique because we build with the materials we have collected not purchased. We feel that we are doing a small part to preserve our rich heritage as native Floridians and to educate others about it as well.
See these and More Artists at the Weekly Farmers Market
Lafayette County Farmers Market
Join the Facebook Group for Updates
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/173399029957056/
A weekly market located in the Town Park featuring local farmer’s produce, jams, jellies, canned goods, baked goods and now handcrafted items as well
Fridays 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm (hours and days may change during the summer months)
Cheryl Folsom
Sadie Ruth’s Cookie
4243 SW CR 534
Mayo, Florida 32066
Phone: (386) 688-2656
Facebook:

Homemade with love, fresh seasonal favorites just like granny made. Also specializing in decorated cakes, cupcakes, cookies, and pies. Her pictures alone can make you gain a few pounds let alone ordering and eating them. She prefers to be contacted via her Facebook page or phone only. She will attend the local Farmers Market as much as possible very week.

We are a small family farm located in Northern Florida. We raise Nubian goats, sheep, and chickens. Our lovely goats give us every day the fresh milk we use to make the most amazing and natural Artisan soap. We are blessed to enjoy every workday.

Mayo Business Directory
post-media
Mayo, Florida, and the surrounding area in Lafayette County Florida has a wide variety of Businesses. We want to encourage more businesses to relocate to this area and to keep the ones that are already here going into the future. This will be an ongoing project and we will be updating this page often. We want to include the business name, address, phone number, hours of operation, email address (if available), website address (if available), and the products or services they provide along with a recent picture of their business.
If you would like to add your business information to this page, please use the
CONTACT US
form with the basic information such as the name of business, address, phone number, hours of operation, what you sell, and website address. You can even send us a flyer about your business or upcoming sales events! We would like a picture of the front of your store to go along with the listing. You can use the Upload File feature to send us your pictures and flyers.

Mayo Fertilizer Inc. is a third-generation, family-owned, full-service ag supply business based in North Florida and operates in Florida, Georgia, and Alabama. We consider ourselves “full service,” meaning that farmers can rely on our operation and services to provide them the majority of their needs. This would include fertilizer (dry and liquid), seed, crop protection products, credit options, and most important above all, sound advice.
